level.heading: Personal jurisdiction.
level.text: The designation or maintenance in the District of a registered agent shall not by itself create the basis for personal jurisdiction over the represented entity in the District.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "designation" for "appointment".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
